text: Walter Riedschy (16 April 1925 – 5 April 2011) was a German footballer who played for SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a defender. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2011 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken players Category:Association football defenders
title: Walter Riedschy
